text:
@WhiteHouse @PressSec Say Trump:
-Ignored our CDC's experts embedded in the WHO who informed Trump administration re Covid-19 as early as December!  
(Mr. 15-2-0), is now:
-Killing jobs
 -830,038+ infected/46,201+ dead
-2018 axed CDC's Pandemic Response Team
-Ignored Navarro's 2 Memos
-politicized it
